means: 公务员; 办公室工作人员; 做笔头工作的人

entry.tran: 文员；文书；耍笔杆子的人
entry.def: If you call someone a pen-pusher, you mean that their work consists of writing or dealing with documents, and does not seem very useful or important.

example.ex: As a result, industry was overmanned and pen-pushers were everywhere.
example.tran: 结果是，企业人浮于事，到处都是耍笔杆子的人。

means.word_mean: 1. a clerk who does boring paperwork
